sentence.Network_en: With his wonted , collected and stately mien, he crossed the unhallowed threshold.
sentence.Network_cn: 他摆出平时那种泰然自若的庄严态度, 跨过那个污浊的门槛.

sentence.Network_en: For once he was wrenched out of his wonted calm.
sentence.Network_cn: 这一次,他陡然失去了惯常的宁静态度.

sentence.Network_en: But the well - bred, artificial smile, when he bent upon the guests, had its wonted steely suavity.
sentence.Network_cn: 但是他哈着腰向宾客招呼的那种彬彬有礼 、 故意装成的笑容里, 却仍然具有它平时那种沉着的殷勤.

auth_sentence.content: McTeague had relapsed to his wonted stolidity.

auth_sentence.content: Had he not wonted to converse formerly with them, he had not now been sought.
